<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Account Group Names by Cloud Type</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/cloud/group/name/{cloud_type}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns list of account group IDs and names filtered by cloud type.

#### Rate Limits ####
* Request rate limit: 4/sec 
* Burst Rate: 4/sec 


## Request

successful operation
